meanings.definition: A slender, straight, pointed missile shot from a bow and having feathers at the end to stabilize flight.
meanings.sent1: The archer aimed the arrow at the target.
meanings.sent2: I found an arrowhead while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The arrow flew past the tree and landed in a pile of leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like arrows, piercing through his heart.
meanings.sent5: The arrow whistled through the air, hitting the bullseye with precision.

meanings.definition: A sign or symbol typically used to indicate direction or show movement.
meanings.sent1: Follow the arrow on the map to reach the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The arrow on the road sign pointed towards the city.
meanings.sent3: The arrow on the compass kept spinning in circles, confused.
meanings.sent4: Her finger traced an arrow in the sand, guiding them to safety.
meanings.sent5: The arrow on the screen blinked, showing the next step to take.

meanings.definition: A mark or symbol resembling an arrow, used to point or direct attention.
meanings.sent1: She drew an arrow next to the important paragraph.
meanings.sent2: The arrow on the website homepage led to the contact page.
meanings.sent3: The arrow drawn on the whiteboard looked more like a squiggle.
meanings.sent4: His gaze followed the arrow painted on the floor, leading him to the exit.
meanings.sent5: The arrow sticker on the package indicated which way was up.
